intro: I'm not so sure about freedom, but I like free software.

post.body: I took a few photos the other day. I don't generally use social media, but I like this place so I thought I'd share the most interesting of them here.

BREAKING NEWS:
Several shootings have occured in the last few hours at Mosques in Christchurch, New Zealand. Total casualties are not known, but the count is expected to be 30+. One of the shooters was killed by police and 3 men and a woman have been arrested by police in relation to this event. One of the shooters live-streamed their attack to Facebook with a GoPro
Link to video: http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit/?Video=1552627677_1HUrXNQjRheQouoqpwcxoxokEBTyvFeq1M

News article covering the events: https://www.stuff.co.nz/national/111313938/live-terror-attack-video-christchurch-mosque-shooting-muslims-new-zealand

It's nice to see that there's a lot of people joining ZeroNet in the last few days. Welcome all, here's a list of some neat zites that you might be interested in:
Gitcenter: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/
it's GitHub but decentralized
IFS: http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/
Basically the archive.org of ZeroNet
Millchan: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/
The main chan-zite, remember to blacklist LG and CP
Picrandom: http://127.0.0.1:43110/picrandom.bit/
Some Russian guy's image blog. Loads of porn, loads of memes
KopyKate: http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit/
The biggest video sharing zite out there. Although a lot of new ones keep popping up so keep a look out for interesting new ones.
InstallGentoo Wiki: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1d6VPcaEivcL9A2dy7Lu5sdouJm2NGe1q/
The /g/ wiki, now on ZeroNet
New ZeroWiki: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LX2wiouHctuUXtu5WkVM9TJJ3YoL6gAfm/
Like the ZeroWiki, but better organized and with more stuff. Links to the old one if you prefer it.

There are loads more, and if you'd like to list your favorites, feel free to do so. Best wishes on the free internet!

So I used to use 0net regularly many moons ago, and I remember there used to be some talk about people making video hosting zites. Did anything ever come of all that? It seems KxoVid bit the dust, and KopyKate seems pretty dead, but where there any to come out of that that are still somewhat active?

A repost from picrandom.bit
I miss that zite, it was one of my favorites

comment.body: @SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: Strange, both domains seem to work for me.
